Say (print) something to the user. If the sentence ends with a whitespace or tab character, a new line is not appended (print + flush). Otherwise are passed straight to puts (behavior got from Highline).

trans-unit.source: Say a status with the given color and appends the message. Since this method is used frequently by actions, it allows nil or false to be given in log_status, avoiding the message from being shown. If a Symbol is given in log_status, it's used as the color.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的颜色说出状态，然后附加消息。由于此方法经常被操作使用，因此它允许在log_status中给出nil或false，从而避免显示消息。如果一个 Symbol 在log_status给出，它用作颜色。

trans-unit.source: Scanning a string means remembering the position of a scan pointer, which is just an index. The point of scanning is to move forward a bit at a time, so matches are sought after the scan pointer; usually immediately after it.
trans-unit.target: 扫描字符串意味着记住扫描指针的位置，而这只是一个索引。扫描的重点是一次向前移动一点，因此在扫描指针之后寻找匹配项。通常在之后。

trans-unit.source: Scanning stops, and scanf returns, when any input character fails to match the specifications in the format string, or when input is exhausted, or when everything in the format string has been matched. All matches found up to the stopping point are returned in the return array (or yielded to the block, if a block was given).
trans-unit.target: 当任何输入字符不符合格式字符串中的规格时,或当输入字符用尽时,或当格式字符串中的所有字符都被匹配时,扫描停止,scanf返回。在停止点之前找到的所有匹配结果都会在返回数组中返回(如果有块,则返回给块)。

trans-unit.source: Scans STDIN for data matching format. See IO#scanf for details.
trans-unit.target: 扫描STDIN以获取数据匹配 format 。有关详细信息，请参见 IO#scanf 。

trans-unit.source: Scans one byte and returns it. This method is not multibyte character sensitive. See also: getch.
trans-unit.target: 扫描一个字节并返回它。此方法对多字节字符不敏感。另请参阅： getch 。

trans-unit.source: Scans one character and returns it. This method is multibyte character sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 扫描一个字符并返回。本方法对多字节字符敏感。

trans-unit.source: Scans the current string until the match is exhausted yielding each match as it is encountered in the string. A block is not necessary as the results will simply be aggregated into the final array.
trans-unit.target: 扫描当前的字符串,直到匹配结果用尽,产生字符串中遇到的每个匹配结果。不需要一个块,因为结果将被简单地汇总到最终的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Scans the current string until the match is exhausted, yielding each match as it is encountered in the string. A block is not necessary though, as the results will simply be aggregated into the final array.
trans-unit.target: 扫描当前的字符串,直到匹配结果用尽,产生字符串中遇到的每个匹配结果。但不需要一个块,因为结果将被简单地汇总到最终的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Scans the current string. If a block is given, it functions exactly like block_scanf.
trans-unit.target: 扫描当前的字符串。如果给定一个块,它的功能与block_scanf完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Scans the string until the pattern is matched. Advances the scan pointer if advance_pointer_p, otherwise not. Returns the matched string if return_string_p is true, otherwise returns the number of bytes advanced. This method does affect the match register.
trans-unit.target: 扫描字符串，直到该 pattern 匹配。如果 advance_pointer_p 推进扫描指针，否则不推进。如果 return_string_p 为true，则返回匹配的字符串，否则返回高级字节数。此方法确实会影响匹配寄存器。

trans-unit.source: Scans the string until the pattern is matched. Returns the substring up to and including the end of the match, advancing the scan pointer to that location. If there is no match, nil is returned.
trans-unit.target: 扫描字符串，直到该 pattern 匹配。返回直到匹配结束（包括匹配结束）的子字符串，将扫描指针前进到该位置。如果不匹配，则返回 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Scheduler somehow registers what the current fiber is waited for, and yields control to other fibers with Fiber.yield (so the fiber would be suspended while expecting its wait to end, and other fibers in the same thread can perform)
trans-unit.target: 调度程序以某种方式注册当前正在等待的光纤，并通过 Fiber.yield 来控制其他光纤（这样，光纤将在等待其结束时被挂起，并且同一线程中的其他光纤可以执行）

trans-unit.source: Search for the specifications that match the given dependency. The specifications in the returned array will be considered in reverse order, so the latest version ought to be last. @note This method should be 'pure', i.e. the return value should depend
trans-unit.target: 搜索符合给定依赖关系的规格。返回数组中的规格将以相反的顺序考虑,因此最新的版本应该是最后一个。@note 这个方法应该是 "纯 "的,也就是说,返回值应该依赖于

trans-unit.source: Search the encoding with specified name. name should be a string.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的编码。名称应为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Search this index's specs, and any source indexes that this index knows about, returning all of the results.
trans-unit.target: 搜索这个索引的规格,以及这个索引所知道的任何源索引,返回所有的结果。

trans-unit.source: Searches key in id list. The result is returned or yielded if a block is given. If it isn't found, nil is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在 id 列表中搜索 key 。如果给出块，则返回结果或产生结果。如果找不到，则返回nil。

trans-unit.source: Searches key in @stack for id hash and returns or yields the result.
trans-unit.target: 在@stack中的 key 中搜索 id 哈希，然后返回或产生结果。

trans-unit.source: Searches self as described at method bsearch, but returns the index of the found element instead of the element itself.
trans-unit.target: 如方法 bsearch 所述搜索 self ，但返回找到的元素的索引，而不是元素本身。

trans-unit.source: Searches sep or pattern (regexp) in the string and returns the part before it, the match, and the part after it. If it is not found, returns two empty strings and str.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串中搜索sep或pattern（regexp），并返回它之前的部分，匹配项以及之后的部分。如果未找到，则返回两个空字符串和str。

trans-unit.source: Searches sep or pattern (regexp) in the string from the end of the string, and returns the part before it, the match, and the part after it. If it is not found, returns two empty strings and str.
trans-unit.target: 从字符串的末尾搜索字符串中的sep或pattern（regexp），并返回它前面的部分，匹配项和后面的部分。如果未找到，则返回两个空字符串和str。

trans-unit.source: Searches list id for opt and the optional patterns for completion pat. If icase is true, the search is case insensitive. The result is returned or yielded if a block is given. If it isn't found, nil is returned.
trans-unit.target: 搜索列表 id 的 opt 和完成可选模式 pat 。如果 icase 为true，则搜索不区分大小写。如果给出块，则返回结果或产生结果。如果找不到，则返回nil。

trans-unit.source: Searches through an array whose elements are also arrays comparing obj with the first element of each contained array using obj.==.
trans-unit.target: 搜索一个数组，该数组的元素也是使用 obj.== 将 obj 与每个包含的数组的第一个元素进行比较的数组。

trans-unit.source: Searches through the array whose elements are also arrays.
trans-unit.target: 在元素也是数组的数组中搜索。

trans-unit.source: Searches through the hash comparing obj with the key using ==. Returns the key-value pair (two elements array) or nil if no match is found. See Array#assoc.
trans-unit.target: 使用 == 搜索散列，将obj与键进行比较。返回键值对（两个元素的数组），如果找不到匹配项，则返回 nil 。参见 Array#assoc 。

trans-unit.source: Searches through the hash comparing obj with the key using ==. Returns the key-value pair (two elements array) or nil if no match is found. See Array#assoc.
trans-unit.target: 使用 == 搜索散列，将obj与键进行比较。返回键值对（两个元素的数组）或 nil (如果找不到匹配项）。参见 Array#assoc 。

trans-unit.source: Searches through the hash comparing obj with the value using ==. Returns the first key-value pair (two-element array) that matches. See also Array#rassoc.
trans-unit.target: 搜索散列，将obj与使用 == 的值进行比较。返回匹配的第一个键值对（两个元素的数组）。另请参见 Array#rassoc 。

trans-unit.source: Searches through the hash comparing obj with the value using ==. Returns the first key-value pair (two-element array) that matches. See also Array#rassoc.
trans-unit.target: 搜索散列，将obj与使用 == 的值进行比较。返回匹配的第一个键值对（两个元素的数组）。另请参见 Array#rassoc 。

trans-unit.source: Second, it is possible to transcode a string, i.e. translate its internal byte representation to another encoding. Its associated encoding is also set to the other encoding. See String#encode for the various forms of transcoding, and the Encoding::Converter class for additional control over the transcoding process.
trans-unit.target: 其次，可以对字符串进行代码转换，即将其内部字节表示形式转换为另一种编码。其关联的编码也设置为其他编码。有关各种形式的代码转换，请参见 String#encode ；有关代码转换过程的其他控制，请参见 Encoding::Converter 类。

trans-unit.source: Secondly, it checks if Bundler has been configured to be “frozen”. Frozen ensures that the Gemfile and the Gemfile.lock file are matching. This stops a situation where a developer may update the Gemfile but may not run `bundle install`, which leads to the Gemfile.lock file not being correctly updated. If this file is not correctly updated then any other developer running `bundle install` will potentially not install the correct gems.
trans-unit.target: 其次，它检查 Bundler 是否已配置为“冻结”。冻结可确保Gemfile和Gemfile.lock文件匹配。这样可以避免开发人员可能会更新Gemfile但可能无法运行“捆绑安装”的情况，从而导致Gemfile.lock文件无法正确更新。如果这个文件没有正确更新，那么其他任何运行“ bundle install”的开发人员都可能不会安装正确的gem。

trans-unit.source: Seconds to reuse the connection of the previous request. If the idle time is less than this Keep-Alive Timeout, Net::HTTP reuses the TCP/IP socket used by the previous communication. The default value is 2 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 重用先前请求的连接的秒数。如果空闲时间小于此Keep-Alive Timeout ，则 Net::HTTP 重用先前通信使用的TCP / IP套接字。默认值为2秒。

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait for 100 Continue response. If the HTTP object does not receive a response in this many seconds it sends the request body. The default value is nil.
trans-unit.target: 等待100的秒数继续响应。如果 HTTP 对象在这么多秒内未收到响应，它将发送请求正文。默认值为 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait until a connection is opened
Seconds to wait until a connection is opened. If the IMAP object cannot open a connection within this time, it raises a Net::OpenTimeout exception. The default value is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 等待连接打开为止的秒数。如果 IMAP 对象在这段时间内无法打开连接，则会引发 Net::OpenTimeout 异常。默认值为30秒。

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait until a connection is opened. If the POP3 object cannot open a connection within this time, it raises a Net::OpenTimeout exception. The default value is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 等待连接打开为止的秒数。如果 POP3 对象在这段时间内无法打开连接，则会引发 Net::OpenTimeout 异常。默认值为30秒。

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait until a connection is opened. See Net::HTTP#open_timeout
trans-unit.target: 等待连接打开为止的秒数。参见 Net::HTTP#open_timeout

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait until reading one block (by one read(1) call). If the POP3 object cannot complete a read() within this time, it raises a Net::ReadTimeout exception. The default value is 60 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 等待直到读取一个块（通过一次read（1）调用）的秒数。如果 POP3 对象在这段时间内无法完成read（），它将引发 Net::ReadTimeout 异常。默认值为60秒。

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait until reading one block. See Net::HTTP#read_timeout
trans-unit.target: 等待几秒钟，直到读取一个块。参见 Net::HTTP#read_timeout

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait until writing one block. See Net::HTTP#write_timeout
trans-unit.target: 等待几秒钟，直到写入一个块。参见 Net::HTTP#write_timeout

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait while attempting to open a connection. If the connection cannot be opened within this time, a Net::OpenTimeout is raised. The default value is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 尝试打开连接时等待的秒数。如果在此时间内无法打开连接，则会引发 Net::OpenTimeout 。默认值为30秒。

trans-unit.source: Seconds to wait while reading one block (by one read(2) call). If the read(2) call does not complete within this time, a Net::ReadTimeout is raised. The default value is 60 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 读取一个块时等待的秒数（通过一次read（2）调用）。如果read（2）调用在此时间内未完成，则会引发 Net::ReadTimeout 。默认值为60秒。

trans-unit.target: 发送具有给定消息ID和参数的 ref 请求。通过调用DRbMessage.send_request，提供位于当前协议之上的流，可以最轻松地实现这一点。

trans-unit.source: Send buffer size without wmem_max limit (Linux 2.6.14)
trans-unit.target: 发送缓冲区大小没有wmem_max限制(Linux 2.6.14)

trans-unit.source: Send the GETACL command along with a specified mailbox. If this mailbox exists, an array containing objects of Net::IMAP::MailboxACLItem will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 发送GETACL命令和指定的 mailbox 。如果此邮箱存在，则将返回一个包含 Net::IMAP::MailboxACLItem 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Send without using the routing tables
Sends “close notify” to the peer and tries to shut down the SSL connection gracefully.
trans-unit.target: 向对等方发送“ close notify”，并尝试正常关闭 SSL 连接。

trans-unit.source: Sends msgstr as a message. Single CR (“r”) and LF (“n”) found in the msgstr, are converted into the CR LF pair. You cannot send a binary message with this method. msgstr should include both the message headers and body.
trans-unit.target: 发送 msgstr 作为消息。在 msgstr 中找到的单个CR（“ r”）和LF（“ n”）被转换为CR LF对。您不能使用此方法发送二进制消息。 msgstr 应同时包含邮件头和正文。
发送io作为文件描述符传递。

trans-unit.source: Sends a APPEND command to append the message to the end of the mailbox. The optional flags argument is an array of flags initially passed to the new message. The optional date_time argument specifies the creation time to assign to the new message; it defaults to the current time. For example:
trans-unit.target: 发送APPEND命令以将 message 追加到 mailbox 末尾。可选的 flags 参数是最初传递给新消息的标志数组。可选的 date_time 参数指定分配给新消息的创建时间；它默认为当前时间。例如：

trans-unit.source: Sends a CAPABILITY command, and returns an array of capabilities that the server supports. Each capability is a string. See [IMAP] for a list of possible capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 发送一个CAPABILITY命令,并返回一个服务器支持的能力数组。每个能力是一个字符串。请参阅[IMAP]获取可能的能力列表。

trans-unit.source: Sends a CHECK command to request a checkpoint of the currently selected mailbox. This performs implementation-specific housekeeping; for instance, reconciling the mailbox's in-memory and on-disk state.
trans-unit.target: 发送 CHECK 命令,请求对当前选定的邮箱进行检查。这将执行特定的实现内务管理;例如,协调邮箱的内存和磁盘状态。

trans-unit.source: Sends a CLOSE command to close the currently selected mailbox. The CLOSE command permanently removes from the mailbox all messages that have the Deleted flag set.
trans-unit.target: 发送CLOSE命令关闭当前选中的邮箱。CLOSE命令从邮箱中永久删除所有设置了删除标志的邮件。

trans-unit.source: Sends a COPY command to copy the specified message(s) to the end of the specified destination mailbox. The set parameter is a number, an array of numbers, or a Range object. The number is a message sequence number.
trans-unit.target: 发送COPY命令以将指定的消息复制到指定的目标 mailbox 的末尾。该 set 参数是一个数字，数字的阵列，或一个 Range 对象。该数字是消息序列号。

trans-unit.source: Sends a COPY request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将COPY请求发送到 path 并获得响应，作为 HTTPResponse 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends a CREATE command to create a new mailbox.
Sends a DELETE command to remove the mailbox.
Sends a DELETE request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将DELETE请求发送到 path 并获得响应，作为 HTTPResponse 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends a EXAMINE command to select a mailbox so that messages in the mailbox can be accessed. Behaves the same as select(), except that the selected mailbox is identified as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 发送检查命令来选择 mailbox 所以在该消息 mailbox 可被访问。行为与 select() 相同，不同之处在于所选 mailbox 被标识为只读。

trans-unit.source: Sends a EXPUNGE command to permanently remove from the currently selected mailbox all messages that have the Deleted flag set.
trans-unit.target: 发送EXPUNGE命令,从当前选定的邮箱中永久删除所有设置了删除标志的邮件。

trans-unit.source: Sends a FETCH command to retrieve data associated with a message in the mailbox.
trans-unit.target: 发送FETCH命令,以检索邮箱中与邮件相关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: Sends a GET request to the path. Returns the response as a Net::HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将GET请求发送到 path 。以 Net::HTTPResponse 对象的形式返回响应。

trans-unit.source: Sends a GET request to the target and returns the HTTP response as a Net::HTTPResponse object. The target can either be specified as (uri), or as (host, path, port = 80); so:
trans-unit.target: 向目标发送GET请求，并以 Net::HTTPResponse 对象的形式返回 HTTP 响应。目标可以指定为（ uri ），也可以指定为（ host ， path ， port = 80）；所以：

trans-unit.source: Sends a GET request to the target and returns the HTTP response as a Net::HTTPResponse object. The target can either be specified as (uri, headers), or as (host, path, port = 80); so:
trans-unit.target: 向目标发送GET请求，并以 Net::HTTPResponse 对象的形式返回 HTTP 响应。目标可以指定为（ uri ， headers ），也可以指定为（ host ， path ， port = 80）; 所以：

trans-unit.source: Sends a GET request to the target and returns the HTTP response as a string. The target can either be specified as (uri), or as (host, path, port = 80); so:
trans-unit.target: 将GET请求发送到目标并以字符串形式返回 HTTP 响应。目标可以指定为（ uri ），也可以指定为（ host ， path ， port = 80）；所以：

trans-unit.source: Sends a GET request to the target and returns the HTTP response as a string. The target can either be specified as (uri, headers), or as (host, path, port = 80); so:
trans-unit.target: 将GET请求发送到目标并以字符串形式返回 HTTP 响应。目标可以指定为（ uri ， headers ），也可以指定为（ host ， path ， port = 80）; 所以：

trans-unit.source: Sends a HEAD request to the path and returns the response as a Net::HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将HEAD请求发送到 path ，并将响应作为 Net::HTTPResponse 对象返回。

trans-unit.source: Sends a LIST command, and returns a subset of names from the complete set of all names available to the client. refname provides a context (for instance, a base directory in a directory-based mailbox hierarchy). mailbox specifies a mailbox or (via wildcards) mailboxes under that context. Two wildcards may be used in mailbox: '*', which matches all characters including the hierarchy delimiter (for instance, '/' on a UNIX-hosted directory-based mailbox hierarchy); and '%', which matches all characters except the hierarchy delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 发送LIST命令，并从客户端可用的所有名称的完整集合中返回名称的子集。 refname 提供上下文（例如，基于目录的邮箱层次结构中的基本目录）。 mailbox 指定上下文下一个邮箱或（通过通配符）邮箱。 mailbox 可以使用两个通配符：“ *”，它匹配所有字符，包括层次结构定界符（例如，在UNIX托管的基于目录的邮箱层次结构中为“ /”）；和'％'，匹配除层次结构定界符之外的所有字符。

trans-unit.source: Sends a LOCK request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将LOCK请求作为 HTTPResponse 对象发送到 path 并获得响应。

trans-unit.source: Sends a LOGIN command to identify the client and carries the plaintext password authenticating this user. Note that, unlike calling authenticate() with an auth_type of “LOGIN”, login() does not use the login authenticator.
trans-unit.target: 发送LOGIN命令以标识客户端，并携带用于验证此 user 身份的纯文本 password 。需要注意的是，不同于调用 authenticate() 与 auth_type “LOGIN”的 login() 并没有使用登录认证。

trans-unit.source: Sends a LOGOUT command to inform the server that the client is done with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 发送一个LOGOUT命令,通知服务器客户端已经完成连接。

trans-unit.source: Sends a LSUB command, and returns a subset of names from the set of names that the user has declared as being “active” or “subscribed.” refname and mailbox are interpreted as for list(). The return value is an array of Net::IMAP::MailboxList.
trans-unit.target: 发送LSUB命令，并从用户已声明为“活动”或“已预订”的名称集中返回名称的子集。 refname 和 mailbox 的解释与 list() 相同。返回值是 Net::IMAP::MailboxList 的数组。

trans-unit.source: Sends a MKCOL request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将MKCOL请求发送到 path 并获得响应，作为 HTTPResponse 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends a MOVE command to move the specified message(s) to the end of the specified destination mailbox. The set parameter is a number, an array of numbers, or a Range object. The number is a message sequence number. The IMAP MOVE extension is described in [RFC-6851].
trans-unit.target: 发送MOVE命令将指定的邮件移到指定的目标 mailbox 的末尾。该 set 参数是一个数字，数字的阵列，或一个 Range 对象。该数字是消息序列号。所述 IMAP MOVE扩展是在[RFC-6851]中描述。

trans-unit.source: Sends a MOVE request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将MOVE请求作为 HTTPResponse 对象发送到 path 并获得响应。

trans-unit.source: Sends a NOOP command to the server. It does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 向服务器发送一个NOOP命令。它什么也不做。

trans-unit.source: Sends a OPTIONS request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将一个OPTIONS请求发送到该 path 并获得响应，作为 HTTPResponse 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends a PATCH request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将PATCH请求发送到 path 并获得响应，作为 HTTPResponse 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends a POST request to the path.
Sends a PROPFIND request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将PROPFIND请求作为 HTTPResponse 对象发送到 path 并获得响应。

trans-unit.source: Sends a PROPPATCH request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将PROPPATCH请求发送到 path 并获得响应，作为 HTTPResponse 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends a RENAME command to change the name of the mailbox to newname.
trans-unit.target: 发送RENAME命令将 mailbox 的名称更改为 newname 。

trans-unit.source: Sends a SEARCH command to search the mailbox for messages that match the given searching criteria, and returns message sequence numbers. keys can either be a string holding the entire search string, or a single-dimension array of search keywords and arguments. The following are some common search criteria; see [IMAP] section 6.4.4 for a full list.
trans-unit.target: 发送SEARCH命令在邮箱中搜索与给定搜索条件匹配的邮件，并返回邮件序列号。 keys 可以是包含整个搜索字符串的字符串，也可以是搜索关键字和参数的一维数组。以下是一些常见的搜索条件；有关完整列表，请参见[IMAP]第6.4.4节。

trans-unit.source: Sends a SELECT command to select a mailbox so that messages in the mailbox can be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 发送SELECT命令选择一个 mailbox 以便可以访问该 mailbox 中的消息。

trans-unit.source: Sends a SETQUOTA command along with the specified mailbox and quota. If quota is nil, then quota will be unset for that mailbox. Typically one needs to be logged in as a server admin for this to work. The IMAP quota commands are described in [RFC-2087].
trans-unit.target: 发送SETQUOTA命令以及指定的 mailbox 和 quota 。如果 quota 为零，则将为该邮箱未设置 quota 。通常，需要以服务器管理员身份登录才能正常工作。所述 IMAP 配额命令在[RFC-2087]中描述。

trans-unit.source: Sends a SORT command to sort messages in the mailbox. Returns an array of message sequence numbers. For example:
trans-unit.target: 发送SORT命令对邮箱中的邮件进行排序。返回一个邮件序列号的数组。例如

trans-unit.source: Sends a STARTTLS command to start TLS session.
trans-unit.target: 发送一个STARTTLS命令来启动TLS会话。

trans-unit.source: Sends a STATUS command, and returns the status of the indicated mailbox. attr is a list of one or more attributes whose statuses are to be requested. Supported attributes include:
trans-unit.target: 发送STATUS命令，并返回指示的 mailbox 的状态。 attr 是一个或多个要请求其状态的属性的列表。支持的属性包括：

trans-unit.source: Sends a STORE command to alter data associated with messages in the mailbox, in particular their flags. The set parameter is a number, an array of numbers, or a Range object. Each number is a message sequence number. attr is the name of a data item to store: 'FLAGS' will replace the message's flag list with the provided one, '+FLAGS' will add the provided flags, and '-FLAGS' will remove them. flags is a list of flags.
trans-unit.target: 发送STORE命令来更改与邮箱中的邮件相关联的数据，尤其是其标志。该 set 参数是一个数字，数字的阵列，或一个 Range 对象。每个数字都是消息序列号。 attr 是要存储的数据项的名称：“ FLAGS”将用提供的标记替换消息的标志列表，“ + FLAGS”将添加提供的标记，而“ -FLAGS”将删除它们。 flags 是标志的列表。

trans-unit.source: Sends a SUBSCRIBE command to add the specified mailbox name to the server's set of “active” or “subscribed” mailboxes as returned by lsub().
trans-unit.target: 发送SUBSCRIBE命令以将指定的 mailbox 名称添加到由 lsub() 返回的服务器的“活动”或“预订”邮箱中。

trans-unit.source: Sends a TRACE request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将TRACE请求作为 HTTPResponse 对象发送到 path 并获得响应。

trans-unit.source: Sends a UNLOCK request to the path and gets a response, as an HTTPResponse object.
trans-unit.target: 将UNLOCK请求发送到 path 并获得响应，作为 HTTPResponse 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends a UNSUBSCRIBE command to remove the specified mailbox name from the server's set of “active” or “subscribed” mailboxes.
trans-unit.target: 发送UNSUBSCRIBE命令从服务器的“活动”或“预订”邮箱集中删除指定的 mailbox 名称。

trans-unit.source: Sends a XLIST command, and returns a subset of names from the complete set of all names available to the client. refname provides a context (for instance, a base directory in a directory-based mailbox hierarchy). mailbox specifies a mailbox or (via wildcards) mailboxes under that context. Two wildcards may be used in mailbox: '*', which matches all characters including the hierarchy delimiter (for instance, '/' on a UNIX-hosted directory-based mailbox hierarchy); and '%', which matches all characters except the hierarchy delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 发送XLIST命令，并从客户端可用的所有名称的完整集合中返回名称的子集。 refname 提供上下文（例如，基于目录的邮箱层次结构中的基本目录）。 mailbox 指定上下文下一个邮箱或（通过通配符）邮箱。 mailbox 可以使用两个通配符：“ *”，它匹配所有字符，包括层次结构定界符（例如，在UNIX托管的基于目录的邮箱层次结构中为“ /”）；和'％'，匹配除层次结构定界符之外的所有字符。

trans-unit.source: Sends a command and expect a response beginning with '2'.
trans-unit.target: 发送一条命令,并期望得到以'2'开头的响应。

trans-unit.source: Sends a command and returns the response.
Sends an HTTP request to the HTTP server. Also sends a DATA string if data is given.
trans-unit.target: 向 HTTP 服务器发送 HTTP 请求。如果同时发送数据串 data 中给出。

trans-unit.source: Sends an HTTPRequest object req to the HTTP server.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTTPRequest 对象 req 发送到 HTTP 服务器。

trans-unit.source: Sends an AUTHENTICATE command to authenticate the client. The auth_type parameter is a string that represents the authentication mechanism to be used. Currently Net::IMAP supports the authentication mechanisms:
trans-unit.target: 发送AUTHENTICATE命令以验证客户端。所述 auth_type 参数是表示所使用的认证机制的字符串。当前 Net::IMAP 支持身份验证机制：

trans-unit.source: Sends an IDLE command that waits for notifications of new or expunged messages. Yields responses from the server during the IDLE.
trans-unit.target: 发送IDLE命令,等待新邮件或删除邮件的通知。在IDLE过程中产生来自服务器的响应。

trans-unit.source: Sends the GETQUOTA command along with specified mailbox. If this mailbox exists, then an array containing a Net::IMAP::MailboxQuota object is returned. This command is generally only available to server admin.
trans-unit.target: 与指定的 mailbox 一起发送GETQUOTA命令。如果此邮箱存在，则返回一个包含 Net::IMAP::MailboxQuota 对象的数组。该命令通常仅对服务器管理员可用。

trans-unit.source: Sends the GETQUOTAROOT command along with the specified mailbox. This command is generally available to both admin and user. If this mailbox exists, it returns an array containing objects of type Net::IMAP::MailboxQuotaRoot and Net::IMAP::MailboxQuota.
trans-unit.target: 发送GETQUOTAROOT命令以及指定的 mailbox 。该命令通常对管理员和用户均可用。如果该邮箱存在，它将返回一个包含 Net::IMAP::MailboxQuotaRoot 和 Net::IMAP::MailboxQuota 类型的对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Sends the SETACL command along with mailbox, user and the rights that user is to have on that mailbox. If rights is nil, then that user will be stripped of any rights to that mailbox. The IMAPACL commands are described in [RFC-2086].
trans-unit.target: 发送SETACL命令以及 mailbox ， user 以及该邮箱上用户要拥有的 rights 。如果 rights 为零，则将剥夺该用户对该邮箱的任何权限。所述 IMAP ACL 命令在[RFC-2086]中描述。

trans-unit.source: Sends the block to method_1. Note that in the first case if parentheses are used the block is sent to method_1.
trans-unit.target: 将块发送到 method_1 。请注意，在第一种情况下，如果使用括号，则将该块发送到 method_1 。
在以下情况下将块发送到 method_2 ：

trans-unit.source: Sends the given signal to the given job
trans-unit.target: 将给定 signal 发送到给定 job

trans-unit.source: Sends the given command to this engine.
trans-unit.target: 将给定命令发送到此引擎。

trans-unit.source: Sends the given signal to the specified process id(s) if pid is positive. If pid is zero signal is sent to all processes whose group ID is equal to the group ID of the process. signal may be an integer signal number or a POSIX signal name (either with or without a SIG prefix). If signal is negative (or starts with a minus sign), kills process groups instead of processes. Not all signals are available on all platforms. The keys and values of Signal.list are known signal names and numbers, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果pid为正，则将给定信号发送到指定的进程ID 。如果pid为零，则向组ID等于进程的组ID的所有进程发送信号。signal可以是整数信号号或POSIX信号名称（带或不带 SIG 前缀）。如果信号为负（或以负号开头），则杀死进程组而不是进程。并非所有信号在所有平台上都可用。 Signal.list 的键和值分别是已知的信号名称和数字。

trans-unit.source: Sends the given signal to the specified process id(s) if pid is positive. If pid is zero, signal is sent to all processes whose group ID is equal to the group ID of the process. If pid is negative, results are dependent on the operating system. signal may be an integer signal number or a POSIX signal name (either with or without a SIG prefix). If signal is negative (or starts with a minus sign), kills process groups instead of processes. Not all signals are available on all platforms. The keys and values of Signal.list are known signal names and numbers, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果pid为正，则将给定信号发送到指定的进程ID 。如果pid为零，则将信号发送到组ID等于该进程的组ID的所有进程。如果pid为负，则结果取决于操作系统。signal可以是整数信号编号或POSIX信号名称（带或不带 SIG 前缀）。如果信号为负（或以负号开头），则杀死进程组而不是进程。并非所有信号在所有平台上都可用。 Signal.list 的键和值分别是已知的信号名称和数字。

trans-unit.source: Separate from but similar to symbol references, the stream contains only one copy of each object (as determined by object_id) for all objects except true, false, nil, Fixnums and Symbols (which are stored separately as described above) a one-indexed 32 bit value will be stored and reused when the object is encountered again. (The first object has an index of 1).
trans-unit.target: 与符号引用分开,但类似于符号引用,流只包含每个对象的一个副本(由object_id决定),除了true、false、nil、Fixnums和Symbols之外的所有对象(如上所述,它们被单独存储),一个单一索引的32位值将被存储,并在再次遇到该对象时重新使用。第一个对象的索引为1)。

trans-unit.source: Sequence of a queue for repair mode (Linux 3.5, glibc 2.18)
Serialization support for the object returned by _getobj_.
trans-unit.target: _ getobj _ 返回的对象的序列化支持。

trans-unit.source: Serializes obj and all descendant objects. If anIO is specified, the serialized data will be written to it, otherwise the data will be returned as a String. If limit is specified, the traversal of subobjects will be limited to that depth. If limit is negative, no checking of depth will be performed.
trans-unit.target: 序列化obj和所有后代对象。如果指定了anIO，则将序列化的数据写入其中，否则，该数据将作为 String 返回。如果指定了limit，则子对象的遍历将限于该深度。如果极限为负，则不会进行深度检查。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the private key to DER-encoded PKCS #8 format. If called without arguments, unencrypted PKCS #8 PrivateKeyInfo format is used. If called with a cipher name and a password, PKCS #8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo format with PBES2 encryption scheme is used.
trans-unit.target: 将私钥序列化为DER编码的PKCS #8格式。如果调用时没有参数,则使用未加密的PKCS #8 PrivateKeyInfo格式。如果使用密码名和密码调用,则使用PBES2加密方案的PKCS #8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo格式。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the private key to PEM-encoded PKCS #8 format. See private_to_der for more details.
trans-unit.target: 将私钥序列化为PEM编码的PKCS＃8格式。有关更多详细信息，请参见 private_to_der 。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the public key to DER-encoded X.509 SubjectPublicKeyInfo format.
trans-unit.target: 将公钥序列化为DER编码的X.509 SubjectPublicKeyInfo格式。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the public key to PEM-encoded X.509 SubjectPublicKeyInfo format.
trans-unit.target: 将公钥序列化为PEM编码的X.509 SubjectPublicKeyInfo格式。

trans-unit.source: Server sessions are added to the session cache
trans-unit.target: 服务器会话被添加到会话缓存中

trans-unit.source: Services are registered with a tuple of the format [:name, klass, DRbObject, description].
trans-unit.target: 服务以[：name，klass， DRbObject ，description] 格式的元组注册。

trans-unit.source: Servname not supported for socket type

trans-unit.target: 设置/取消设置 "静音 "模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets OptionParser object, when opt is false or nil, methods OptionParser::Arguable#options and OptionParser::Arguable#options= are undefined. Thus, there is no ways to access the OptionParser object via the receiver object.
trans-unit.target: 设置 OptionParser 对象，当 opt 为 false 或 nil 时，方法 OptionParser::Arguable#options 和 OptionParser::Arguable#options= 未定义。因此，无法通过接收器对象访问 OptionParser 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets Fiber scheduler for the current thread. If the scheduler is set, non-blocking fibers (created by Fiber.new with blocking: false, or by Fiber.schedule) call that scheduler's hook methods on potentially blocking operations, and the current thread will call scheduler's close method on finalization (allowing the scheduler to properly manage all non-finished fibers).
trans-unit.target: 设置当前线程的 Fiber 调度程序。如果设置了调度程序，则非阻塞光纤（由 Fiber.new 创建，带有 blocking: false 或 Fiber.schedule ）在潜在的阻塞操作上调用该调度程序的hook方法，并且当前线程将在完成时调用调度程序的 close 方法（允许调度程序以正确管理所有未完成的纤维）。

trans-unit.source: Sets self to consider only identity in comparing keys; two keys are considered the same only if they are the same object; returns self.
trans-unit.target: 设置 self 以在比较密钥时仅考虑身份；仅当两个键是相同的对象时，它们才被认为是相同的；返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Sets dmp1, dmq1, iqmp for the RSA instance. They are calculated by d mod (p - 1), d mod (q - 1) and q^(-1) mod p respectively.
trans-unit.target: 为 RSA 实例设置dmp1，dmq1，iqmp。它们分别由 d mod (p - 1) ， d mod (q - 1) 和 q^(-1) mod p 计算。

trans-unit.source: Sets flags to the Store. flags consists of zero or more of the constants defined in with name V_FLAG_* or'ed together.
trans-unit.target: 将标志设置为 Store 。标志由零个或多个由名称V_FLAG_ *定义或一起定义的常数组成。

trans-unit.source: Sets pub_key and priv_key for the DH instance. priv_key may be nil.
trans-unit.target: 为 DH 实例设置pub_key和priv_key。priv_key可能为 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Sets pub_key and priv_key for the DSA instance. priv_key may be nil.
trans-unit.target: 为 DSA 实例设置pub_key和priv_key。priv_key可能为 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a list of characters that cause a filename to be quoted by the completer when they appear in a completed filename. The default is nil.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个字符列表,当这些字符出现在已完成的文件名中时,会导致完成者引用这些字符。默认值是nil。

trans-unit.source: Sets a list of characters which can be used to quote a substring of the line. Completion occurs on the entire substring, and within the substring Readline.completer_word_break_characters are treated as any other character, unless they also appear within this list.
trans-unit.target: 设置字符列表，可用于引用该行的子字符串。完成发生在整个子字符串上，并且在子字符串 Readline.completer_word_break_characters 中，该字符将被视为任何其他字符，除非它们也出现在此列表中。

trans-unit.source: Sets a list of quote characters which can cause a word break.
trans-unit.target: 设置可导致断字的引号字符列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets a socket option. These are protocol and system specific, see your local system documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个套接字选项。这些都是特定于协议和系统的,详情请查看本地系统文档。

trans-unit.source: Sets a specific section name with a Hashpairs.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Hash 对设置特定的节名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets a thread local with key to value. Note that these are local to threads, and not to fibers. Please see Thread#thread_variable_get and Thread#[] for more information.
trans-unit.target: 将本地线程的 key 设置为 value 。请注意，这些是线程局部的，而不是纤维局部的。有关更多信息，请参见 Thread#thread_variable_get 和 Thread#[] 。

trans-unit.source: Sets an OpenSSL::PKey::RSA or OpenSSL::PKey::DSA object. (This method is appeared in Michal Rokos's OpenSSL extension.)
trans-unit.target: 设置一个 OpenSSL::PKey::RSA 或 OpenSSL::PKey::DSA 对象。（此方法出现在Michal Rokos的 OpenSSL 扩展中。）

trans-unit.source: Sets an OpenSSL::X509::Certificate object as client certificate. (This method is appeared in Michal Rokos's OpenSSL extension).
trans-unit.target: 将 OpenSSL::X509::Certificate 对象设置为客户端证书。（此方法出现在Michal Rokos的 OpenSSL 扩展中）。

trans-unit.source: Sets an output stream for debugging.
Sets create identifier, which is used to decide if the json_create hook of a class should be called; initial value is json_class:
trans-unit.target: 设置创建标识符，该标识符用于确定是否应调用类的json_create钩子；初始值为 json_class ：

trans-unit.source: Sets default external encoding. You should not set Encoding::default_external in ruby code as strings created before changing the value may have a different encoding from strings created after the value was changed., instead you should use ruby -E to invoke ruby with the correct default_external.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认的外部编码。您不应该在ruby代码中设置 Encoding::default_external ，因为在更改值之前创建的字符串可能与更改值之后创建的字符串具有不同的编码。相反，您应该使用 ruby -E 来使用正确的default_external调用ruby。

trans-unit.source: Sets default internal encoding or removes default internal encoding when passed nil. You should not set Encoding::default_internal in ruby code as strings created before changing the value may have a different encoding from strings created after the change. Instead you should use ruby -E to invoke ruby with the correct default_internal.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认内部编码或在传递nil时删除默认内部编码。您不应该在ruby代码中设置 Encoding::default_internal ，因为在更改值之前创建的字符串可能与更改之后创建的字符串具有不同的编码。相反，您应该使用 ruby -E 以正确的default_internal调用ruby。

trans-unit.source: Sets flags on the group. The flag value is used to determine how to encode the group: encode explicit parameters or named curve using an OID.
trans-unit.target: 设置组的标志。标志值用于决定如何对该组进行编码:使用OID对显式参数或命名曲线进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Sets how long until the session expires in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 设置会话结束的时间(秒)。

trans-unit.source: Sets optional filename and line number that will be used in ERB code evaluation and error reporting. See also filename= and lineno=
trans-unit.target: 设置将在 ERB 代码评估和错误报告中使用的可选文件名和行号。另请参见 filename= 和 lineno=

trans-unit.source: Sets or Returns the JSON generator state class that is used by JSON. This is either JSON::Ext::Generator::State or JSON::Pure::Generator::State:
trans-unit.target: 设置或返回 JSON 所使用的发电机状态类 JSON 。这可以是 JSON::Ext::Generator::State 或JSON :: Pure :: Generator :: State：

trans-unit.source: Sets or retrieves additional certificates apart from the timestamp certificate (e.g. intermediate certificates) to be added to the Response. Must be an Array of OpenSSL::X509::Certificate.
trans-unit.target: 设置或检索除了要添加到 Response 的时间戳证书（例如，中间证书）以外的其他证书。必须是一个 Array 的 OpenSSL::X509::Certificate 。

trans-unit.source: Sets or retrieves the Time value to be used in the Response. Must be present for timestamp creation.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取要在 Response 中使用的 Time 值。创建时间戳记时必须存在。

trans-unit.source: Sets or retrieves the resume status, which decides whether incomplete transfers are resumed or restarted. Default: false.
trans-unit.target: 设置或获取 resume 状态，该状态决定是恢复还是重新启动不完整的传输。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets or retrieves the digest algorithms that the factory is allowed create timestamps for. Known vulnerable or weak algorithms should not be allowed where possible. Must be an Array of String or OpenSSL::Digest subclass instances.
trans-unit.target: 设置或检索允许工厂为其创建时间戳的摘要算法。在可能的情况下，不应允许使用已知的易受攻击或较弱的算法。必须是一个 Array 的 String 或 OpenSSL::Digest 子类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Sets or retrieves the serial number to be used for timestamp creation. Must be present for timestamp creation.
trans-unit.target: 设置或检索用于创建时间戳的序列号。创建时间戳时必须存在。

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns default options for the JSON.load method. Initially:
trans-unit.target: 设置或返回 JSON.load 方法的默认选项。最初：

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns the default options for the JSON.dump method. Initially:
trans-unit.target: 设置或返回 JSON.dump 方法的默认选项。最初：

trans-unit.source: Sets path of a CA certification directory containing certifications in PEM format.
trans-unit.target: 设置包含 PEM 格式认证的 CA 认证目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets path of a CA certification file in PEM format.
trans-unit.target: 设置PEM格式的CA证书文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets saner defaults optimized for the use with HTTP-like protocols.
trans-unit.target: 设置更简洁的默认值,为使用类似HTTP的协议进行优化。

trans-unit.source: Sets start time of the session. Time resolution is in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 设置会话的开始时间。 Time 分辨率以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Sets the “sync mode'' to true or false. When sync mode is true, all output is immediately flushed to the underlying operating system and is not buffered internally. Returns the new state. See also IO#fsync.
trans-unit.target: 将“同步模式”设置为 true 或 false 。当同步模式为true时，所有输出将立即刷新到基础操作系统，并且不会在内部进行缓冲。返回新状态。另请参见 IO#fsync 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the “sync mode'' to true or false. When sync mode is true, all output is immediately flushed to the underlying operating system and is not buffered internally. Returns the new state. See also IO#fsync.
trans-unit.target: 将“同步模式”设置为 true 或 false 。当同步模式为true时，所有输出将立即刷新到基础操作系统，并且不会在内部进行缓冲。返回新状态。另请参见 IO#fsync 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the (group) real and/or effective group IDs of the current process to rid and eid, respectively. A value of -1 for either means to leave that ID unchanged. Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 将当前进程的（组）实际和/或有效组ID 分别设置为rid和eid。任一个值为 -1 表示保持该ID不变。并非在所有平台上都可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the (group) real, effective, and saved user IDs of the current process to rid, eid, and sid respectively. A value of -1 for any value means to leave that ID unchanged. Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 将当前进程的（组）真实，有效和保存的用户ID分别设置为rid，eid和sid。任何值的值 -1 表示保持该ID不变。并非在所有平台上都可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the (user) real and/or effective user IDs of the current process to rid and eid, respectively. A value of -1 for either means to leave that ID unchanged. Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 将当前进程的（用户）真实和/或有效用户ID 分别设置为rid和eid。任一个值为 -1 表示保持该ID不变。并非在所有平台上都可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the (user) real, effective, and saved user IDs of the current process to rid, eid, and sid respectively. A value of -1 for any value means to leave that ID unchanged. Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 将当前进程的（用户）真实，有效和保存的用户ID分别设置为rid，eid和sid。任何值的值 -1 表示保持该ID不变。并非在所有平台上都可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the (user) user ID for this process. Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 设置此流程的(用户)用户ID。并非所有平台都有。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SSL session cache mode. Bitwise-or together the desired SESSION_CACHE_* constants to set. See SSL_CTX_set_session_cache_mode(3) for details.
trans-unit.target: 设置 SSL 会话缓存模式。按位或一起设置所需的SESSION_CACHE_ *常量。有关详细信息，请参见SSL_CTX_set_session_cache_mode（3）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the EC::Group for the key. The group structure is internally copied so modification to group after assigning to a key has no effect on the key.
trans-unit.target: 设置密钥的 EC::Group 。组结构是内部复制的，因此在分配给键之后对组的修改对键没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Sets the HTTP Range: header. Accepts either a Range object as a single argument, or a beginning index and a length from that index. Example:
trans-unit.target: 设置 HTTP Range：标头。接受 Range 对象作为单个参数，或者接受起始索引以及该索引的长度。例：

trans-unit.source: Sets the Session to be used when the connection is established.
trans-unit.target: 设置建立连接时要使用的 Session 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the system_path that new instances of Shell should have as their initial system_path.
trans-unit.target: 将 Shell 的新实例应具有的 system_path 设置为其初始system_path。

trans-unit.source: Sets the HTTPS verify mode. Defaults to OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_PEER.
trans-unit.target: 设置HTTPS的验证模式,默认为OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_PEER。默认值为 OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_PEER。

trans-unit.source: Sets the IV/nonce length of the Cipher. Normally block ciphers don't allow changing the IV length, but some make use of IV for 'nonce'. You may need this for interoperability with other applications.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Cipher 的IV / nonce长度。通常，分组密码不允许更改IV长度，但是有些密码将IV用作“ nonce”。为了与其他应用程序具有互操作性，可能需要此功能。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SSL certificate authority file.
Sets the SSL certificate authority path.
trans-unit.target: 设置SSL证书颁发机构的路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SSL/TLS protocol version for the context. This forces connections to use only the specified protocol version. This is deprecated and only provided for backwards compatibility. Use min_version= and max_version= instead.
trans-unit.target: 设置上下文的SSL / TLS协议版本。这将强制连接仅使用指定的协议版本。不推荐使用此方法，仅是为了向后兼容而提供。请改用 min_version= 和 max_version= 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the X509::Store to verify peer certificate.
trans-unit.target: 设置 X509::Store 来验证对等体证书。

trans-unit.source: Sets the access and modification times of each named file to the first two arguments. If a file is a symlink, this method acts upon its referent rather than the link itself; for the inverse behavior see File.lutime. Returns the number of file names in the argument list.
trans-unit.target: 将每个命名文件的访问和修改时间设置为前两个参数。如果文件是符号链接，则此方法根据其引用对象而不是链接本身进行操作；有关逆行为，请参见 File.lutime 。返回参数列表中文件名的数量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the access and modification times of each named file to the first two arguments. If a file is a symlink, this method acts upon the link itself as opposed to its referent; for the inverse behavior, see File.utime. Returns the number of file names in the argument list.
trans-unit.target: 将每个命名文件的访问和修改时间设置为前两个参数。如果文件是符号链接，则此方法对链​​接本身（而不是其引用对象）起作用；有关逆行为，请参见 File.utime 。返回参数列表中文件名的数量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the authentication tag to verify the integrity of the ciphertext. This can be called only when the cipher supports AE. The tag must be set after calling Cipher#decrypt, Cipher#key= and Cipher#iv=, but before calling Cipher#final. After all decryption is performed, the tag is verified automatically in the call to Cipher#final.
trans-unit.target: 设置身份验证标签以验证密文的完整性。仅当密码支持AE时才能调用此方法。必须在调用 Cipher#decrypt ， Cipher#key= 和 Cipher#iv= 之后但在调用 Cipher#final 之前设置标签。完成所有解密后，将在对 Cipher#final 的调用中自动验证标签。

trans-unit.source: Sets the backtrace information associated with exc. The backtrace must be an array of String objects or a single String in the format described in Exception#backtrace.
trans-unit.target: 设置与 exc 相关的回溯信息。该 backtrace 必须的阵列 String 对象或一个单一的 String 中所描述的格式 Exception#backtrace 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the basic list of characters that signal a break between words for rl_complete_internal(). The default is the value of Readline.basic_word_break_characters.
trans-unit.target: 设置表示rl_complete_internal（）的单词间中断的字符的基本列表。默认值为 Readline.basic_word_break_characters 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the basic list of characters that signal a break between words for the completer routine. The default is the characters which break words for completion in Bash: “ tn"\'`@$><=;|&{(”.
trans-unit.target: 设置信号的基本列表，这些信号表示完成程序例程中单词之间的中断。默认值为在Bash中打断要完成的单词的字符：“ tn” \'`@ $> <=; |＆{（”。

trans-unit.source: Sets the byte position of the scan pointer.
trans-unit.target: 设置扫描指针的字节位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the challenge to be associated with the SPKI. May be used by the server, e.g. to prevent replay.
trans-unit.target: 将挑战设置为与 SPKI 相关联。服务器可以使用它，例如，防止重放。

trans-unit.source: Sets the cipher IV. Please note that since you should never be using ECB mode, an IV is always explicitly required and should be set prior to encryption. The IV itself can be safely transmitted in public, but it should be unpredictable to prevent certain kinds of attacks. You may use Cipher#random_iv to create a secure random IV.
trans-unit.target: 设置密码IV。请注意，由于永远不要使用ECB模式，因此始终明确需要IV，并且应在加密之前进行设置。IV本身可以安全地在公共场所传播，但是，防止某些类型的攻击应该是不可预测的。您可以使用 Cipher#random_iv 创建安全的随机IV。

trans-unit.source: Sets the cipher key. To generate a key, you should either use a secure random byte string or, if the key is to be derived from a password, you should rely on PBKDF2 functionality provided by OpenSSL::PKCS5. To generate a secure random-based key, Cipher#random_key may be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置密码密钥。要生成密钥，您应该使用安全的随机字节字符串，或者，如果密钥是从密码派生的，则应该依赖于 OpenSSL::PKCS5 提供的PBKDF2功能。为了生成安全的基于随机的密钥，可以使用 Cipher#random_key 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the cipher's additional authenticated data. This field must be set when using AEAD cipher modes such as GCM or CCM. If no associated data shall be used, this method must still be called with a value of “”. The contents of this field should be non-sensitive data which will be added to the ciphertext to generate the authentication tag which validates the contents of the ciphertext.
trans-unit.target: 设置密码的其他身份验证数据。使用AEAD密码模式（例如GCM或CCM）时，必须设置此字段。如果不使用任何关联数据，则仍必须使用“”值来调用此方法。该字段的内容应该是非敏感数据，将其添加到密文中以生成验证标签，以验证密文的内容。

trans-unit.source: Sets the class variable named by symbol to the given object. If the class variable name is passed as a string, that string is converted to a symbol.
trans-unit.target: 将以符号命名的类变量设置为给定对象。如果类变量名作为字符串传递，则该字符串将转换为符号。

trans-unit.source: Sets the content type in an HTTP header. The type should be a full HTTP content type, e.g. “text/html”. The params are an optional Hash of parameters to add after the content type, e.g. {'charset' => 'iso-8859-1'}
trans-unit.target: 在 HTTP 标头中设置内容类型。该 type 应为完整的 HTTP 内容类型，例如“ text / html”。所述 params 是一个可选的 Hash 的参数的内容类型后添加，例如，{“字符集” =>“ISO-8859-1”}

trans-unit.source: Sets the context in which a session can be reused. This allows sessions for multiple applications to be distinguished, for example, by name.
trans-unit.target: 设置会话可重复使用的上下文。这允许多个应用程序的会话被区分开来,例如,通过名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current file to the next file in ARGV. If there aren't any more files it has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 将当前文件设置为ARGV中的下一个文件。如果没有更多的文件,则没有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: Sets the curve parameters. generator must be an instance of EC::Point that is on the curve. order and cofactor are integers.
trans-unit.target: 设置曲线参数。generator必须是曲线上 EC::Point 的实例。order和cofactor是整数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default command when thor is executed without an explicit command to be called.
trans-unit.target: 设置在没有明确的命令被调用的情况下执行thor时的默认命令。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default proc for self to proc: (see Default Values):
trans-unit.target: 将 self 的默认proc设置为 proc ：（请参阅默认值）：

trans-unit.source: Sets the default proc to be executed on each failed key lookup.
trans-unit.target: 设置在每次失败的密钥查找时要执行的默认程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default value to value; returns value:
trans-unit.target: 将默认值设置为 value ; 返回 value ：

trans-unit.source: Sets the default value, the value returned for a key that does not exist in the hash. It is not possible to set the default to a Proc that will be executed on each key lookup.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认值，即哈希中不存在的键的返回值。无法将默认值设置为将在每次按键查找时执行的 Proc 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default value, the value returned for a key that does not exist in the hash. It is not possible to set the default to a Proc that will be executed on each key lookup.
trans-unit.target: 设置默认值，即哈希中不存在的键的返回值。无法将默认值设置为将在每次按键查找时执行的 Proc 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default values for various optimizations in the Ruby iseq compiler.
trans-unit.target: 设置Ruby iseq编译器中各种优化的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the depth of SSL certificate verification
Sets the effective group ID for this process. Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 设置此流程的有效组ID。并非所有平台都有。

trans-unit.source: Sets the effective user ID for this process. Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 设置此流程的有效用户ID。并非所有平台都有。

trans-unit.source: Sets the environment variable name to value. If the value given is nil the environment variable is deleted. name must be a string.
trans-unit.target: 将环境变量 name 设置为 value 。如果给定的值为 nil ，则删除环境变量。 name 必须是字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extra X509 certificates to be added to the certificate chain. See OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext#extra_chain_cert=
trans-unit.target: 设置要添加到证书链的额外X509证书。参见 OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext#extra_chain_cert=

trans-unit.source: Sets the filename extension for in-place editing mode to the given String. Each file being edited has this value appended to its filename. The modified file is saved under this new name.
trans-unit.target: 将就地编辑模式的文件扩展名设置为给定的 String 。每个正在编辑的文件都将此值附加到其文件名中。修改后的文件将以该新名称保存。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flags for server the certification verification at beginning of SSL/TLS session.
trans-unit.target: 设置SSL/TLS会话开始时,服务器进行认证验证的标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets the form how EC::Point data is encoded as ASN.1 as defined in X9.62.
trans-unit.target: 设置以下格式：如何将 EC::Point 数据编码为X9.62中定义的ASN.1。

trans-unit.source: Sets the group ID for this process.
Sets the header field corresponding to the case-insensitive key.
trans-unit.target: 设置与大小写不敏感键相对应的标题字段。

trans-unit.source: Sets the host part of the Bundler::URI as the argument with brackets for IPv6 addresses.
trans-unit.target: 将 Bundler::URI 的主机部分设置为带有IPv6地址括号的参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the host part of the URI as the argument with brackets for IPv6 addresses.
trans-unit.target: 将 URI 的主机部分设置为带有IPv6地址括号的参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the instance variable named by symbol to the given object, thereby frustrating the efforts of the class's author to attempt to provide proper encapsulation. The variable does not have to exist prior to this call. If the instance variable name is passed as a string, that string is converted to a symbol.
trans-unit.target: 将由符号命名的实例变量设置为给定的对象，从而使类的作者尝试提供适当的封装的工作变得沮丧。该变量在此调用之前不必存在。如果实例变量名称作为字符串传递，则该字符串将转换为符号。

trans-unit.source: Sets the instance variable named by symbol to the given object. This may circumvent the encapsulation intended by the author of the class, so it should be used with care. The variable does not have to exist prior to this call. If the instance variable name is passed as a string, that string is converted to a symbol.
trans-unit.target: 将由symbol命名的实例变量设置为给定对象。这可能会避开该类作者的预期封装，因此应谨慎使用。该变量在此调用之前不必存在。如果实例变量名称作为字符串传递，则该字符串将转换为符号。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key length of the cipher. If the cipher is a fixed length cipher then attempting to set the key length to any value other than the fixed value is an error.
trans-unit.target: 设置密文的密钥长度,如果密文是一个固定长度的密文,那么试图将密钥长度设置为固定值以外的任何值都是错误的。如果密码是一个固定长度的密码,那么试图将密钥长度设置为固定值以外的任何值都是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the last Error of the current executing Thread to error
trans-unit.target: 将当前正在执行的 Thread 的最后一个 Error 设置为 error

trans-unit.source: Sets the last win32 Error of the current executing Thread to error
trans-unit.target: 将当前正在执行的 Thread 的最后一个win32 Error 设置为 error

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of the authentication tag to be generated or to be given for AEAD ciphers that requires it as in input parameter. Note that not all AEAD ciphers support this method.
trans-unit.target: 设置AEAD密码器需要生成或给出的认证标签的长度,如同输入参数一样。注意,并非所有的AEAD密码器都支持这种方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the line number of ARGF as a whole to the given Integer.
trans-unit.target: 将 ARGF 的行总数设置为给定的 Integer 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of “supported elliptic curves” for this context.
trans-unit.target: 设置此上下文的“支持的椭圆曲线”列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of available cipher suites for this context. Note in a server context some ciphers require the appropriate certificates. For example, an RSA cipher suite can only be chosen when an RSA certificate is available.
trans-unit.target: 设置此上下文的可用密码套件列表。注意在服务器上下文中,有些密码需要相应的证书。例如,只有当RSA证书可用时,才能选择RSA密码套件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of characters that are word break characters, but should be left in text when it is passed to the completion function. Programs can use this to help determine what kind of completing to do. For instance, Bash sets this variable to “$@” so that it can complete shell variables and hostnames.
trans-unit.target: 设置作为分词符的字符列表，但是在传递给完成功能时应保留在文本中。程序可以使用它来帮助确定完成工作的类型。例如，Bash将此变量设置为“ $ @”，以便它可以完成shell变量和主机名。

trans-unit.source: Sets the log priority mask. A method LOG_UPTO is defined to make it easier to set mask values. Example:
trans-unit.target: 设置日志优先级掩码。定义了一个方法LOG_UPTO,以方便设置掩码值。例子:LOG_UPTO

trans-unit.source: Sets the lower bound on the supported SSL/TLS protocol version. The version may be specified by an integer constant named OpenSSL::SSL::*_VERSION, a Symbol, or nil which means “any version”.
trans-unit.target: 设置受支持的SSL / TLS协议版本的下限。版本可以通过名为OpenSSL :: SSL :: * _ VERSION的整数常量， Symbol 或 nil 来指定，这意味着“任何版本”。

trans-unit.source: Sets the max number of flags interned to symbols.
trans-unit.target: 设置符号的最大标志数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum SSL version. See OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext#max_version=
Sets the maximum depth for the certificate chain verification.
trans-unit.target: 设置证书链验证的最大深度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of gids allowed in the supplemental group access list.
trans-unit.target: 设置补充组访问列表中允许的最大gids数量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum size of the queue to the given number.
trans-unit.target: 将队列的最大大小设置为给定的 number 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum SSL version. See OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext#min_version=
Sets the minimum and maximum supported protocol versions. See min_version= and max_version=.
trans-unit.target: 设置最小和最大支持的协议版本。参见 min_version= 和 max_version= 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the named constant to the given object, returning that object. Creates a new constant if no constant with the given name previously existed.
trans-unit.target: 将命名的常量设置为给定对象,返回该对象。如果之前没有给定名称的常量存在,则创建一个新的常量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the namespace for the Bundler::Thor or Bundler::Thor::Group class. By default the namespace is retrieved from the class name. If your Bundler::Thor class is named Scripts::MyScript, the help method, for example, will be called as:
trans-unit.target: 设置Bundler :: Thor或 Bundler::Thor::Group 类的名称空间。默认情况下，名称空间是从类名称检索的。如果您的Bundler :: Thor类命名为Scripts :: MyScript，则帮助方法例如将被称为：

trans-unit.source: Sets the nonce (number used once) that the server shall include in its response. If the nonce is set, the server must return the same nonce value in a valid Response.
trans-unit.target: 设置服务器应在其响应中包括的随机数（一次使用的编号）。如果设置了现时值，则服务器必须在有效的 Response 中返回相同的现时值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the output padding while executing a block and resets it.
trans-unit.target: 设置执行块时的输出填充,并将其复位。

trans-unit.source: Sets the output padding, not allowing less than zero values.
trans-unit.target: 设置输出padding,不允许小于零的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the payload of the vertex with the given name @param [String] name the name of the vertex @param [Object] payload the payload @return [Void]
trans-unit.target: 设置给定名称的顶点的有效载荷 @param [String]name 顶点的名称 @param [Object]payload 有效载荷 @return [Void]返回。

trans-unit.source: Sets the prefix length in bits
trans-unit.target: 设置前缀长度,以比特为单位

trans-unit.source: Sets the preset dictionary and returns string. This method is available just only after Zlib::Deflate.new or Zlib::ZStream#reset method was called. See zlib.h for details.
trans-unit.target: 设置预设字典并返回 string 。仅在 Zlib::Deflate.new 或 Zlib::ZStream#reset 方法之后，此方法才可用。有关详细信息，请参见zlib.h。

trans-unit.source: Sets the preset dictionary and returns string. This method is available just only after a Zlib::NeedDict exception was raised. See zlib.h for details.
trans-unit.target: 设置预设字典并返回 string 。仅在引发 Zlib::NeedDict 异常之后，此方法才可用。有关详细信息，请参见zlib.h。

trans-unit.source: Sets the priority of thr to integer. Higher-priority threads will run more frequently than lower-priority threads (but lower-priority threads can also run).
trans-unit.target: 将thr的优先级设置为integer。高优先级的线程将比低优先级的线程更频繁地运行（但低优先级的线程也可以运行）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the process group ID of pid (0 indicates this process) to integer. Not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 将进程组ID pid（0表示此进程）设置为integer。并非在所有平台上都可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the process title that appears on the ps(1) command. Not necessarily effective on all platforms. No exception will be raised regardless of the result, nor will NotImplementedError be raised even if the platform does not support the feature.
trans-unit.target: 设置出现在ps（1）命令上的进程标题。不一定在所有平台上都有效。无论结果如何，都不会引发 NotImplementedError 即使平台不支持此功能，也不会引发NotImplementedError。

trans-unit.source: Sets the proxy server. The proxy may be the URI of the proxy server, the symbol :ENV which will read the proxy from the environment or nil to disable use of a proxy. See proxy_from_env for details on setting the proxy from the environment.
trans-unit.target: 设置代理服务器。该 proxy 可以是 URI 的代理服务器的，符号 :ENV 将读取来自环境或零到禁止使用代理的代理。有关从环境设置代理的详细信息，请参见 proxy_from_env 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the proxy server. The proxy may be the Bundler::URI of the proxy server, the symbol :ENV which will read the proxy from the environment or nil to disable use of a proxy. See proxy_from_env for details on setting the proxy from the environment.
trans-unit.target: 设置代理服务器。该 proxy 可能是 Bundler::URI 的代理服务器，符号 :ENV 将读取来自环境或零到禁止使用代理的代理。有关从环境设置代理的详细信息，请参见 proxy_from_env 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the public key to be associated with the SPKI, an instance of OpenSSL::PKey. This should be the public key corresponding to the private key used for signing the SPKI.
trans-unit.target: 设置要与 SPKI 关联的公共密钥，SPKI是 OpenSSL::PKey 的实例。这应该是与用于签署 SPKI 的私钥相对应的公钥。

trans-unit.source: Sets the purpose of the context. See Store#purpose=.
trans-unit.target: 设置上下文的目的。请参阅 Store#purpose= 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the replacement string by the given object for undefined character. The object should be a Hash, a Proc, a Method, or an object which has [] method. Its key is an undefined character encoded in the source encoding of current transcoder. Its value can be any encoding until it can be converted into the destination encoding of the transcoder.
trans-unit.target: 将给定对象的替换字符串设置为未定义字符。该对象应该是 Hash ， Proc ， Method 或具有[]方法的对象。它的密钥是在当前代码转换器的源编码中编码的未定义字符。它的值可以是任何编码，直到可以将其转换为代码转换器的目标编码为止。

trans-unit.source: Sets the replacement string to the given value. The default replacement string is “uFFFD” for Unicode encoding forms, and “?” otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 将替换字符串设置为给定值。对于Unicode编码形式，默认替换字符串是“ uFFFD”，而“？” 除此以外。

trans-unit.source: Sets the resolver timeouts. This may be a single positive number or an array of positive numbers representing timeouts in seconds. If an array is specified, a DNS request will retry and wait for each successive interval in the array until a successful response is received. Specifying nil reverts to the default timeouts:
trans-unit.target: 设置解析器超时。这可以是单个正数，也可以是代表超时的正数数组，以秒为单位。如果指定了阵列，则 DNS 请求将重试并等待阵列中的每个连续间隔，直到收到成功的响应。指定 nil 将恢复为默认超时：

trans-unit.source: Sets the resource limit of the process. cur_limit means current (soft) limit and max_limit means maximum (hard) limit.
trans-unit.target: 设置进程的资源限制。cur_limit表示当前（软）限制，max_limit表示最大（硬）限制。

trans-unit.source: Sets the root for this thor class. Relatives path are added to the directory where the script was invoked and expanded.
trans-unit.target: 设置这个thor类的根。亲属路径被添加到脚本被调用和展开的目录中。

trans-unit.source: Sets the scan pointer to the end of the string and clear matching data.
trans-unit.target: 将扫描指针设置为字符串的末端,并清除匹配数据。

trans-unit.source: Sets the scan pointer to the previous position. Only one previous position is remembered, and it changes with each scanning operation.
trans-unit.target: 将扫描指针设置为以前的位置。只记住一个以前的位置,并且每次扫描操作都会改变。

trans-unit.source: Sets the security level for the context. OpenSSL limits parameters according to the level. The “parameters” include: ciphersuites, curves, key sizes, certificate signature algorithms, protocol version and so on. For example, level 1 rejects parameters offering below 80 bits of security, such as ciphersuites using MD5 for the MAC or RSA keys shorter than 1024 bits.
trans-unit.target: 设置上下文的安全级别。 OpenSSL 根据级别限制参数。“参数”包括：密码套件，曲线，密钥大小，证书签名算法，协议版本等。例如，级别1拒绝提供低于80位安全性的参数，例如使用短于1024位的MAC或RSA密钥使用MD5的密码套件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the server hostname used for SNI. This needs to be set before SSLSocket#connect.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于SNI的服务器主机名。这需要在 SSLSocket#connect 之前设置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the session cache size. Returns the previously valid session cache size. Zero is used to represent an unlimited session cache size.
trans-unit.target: 设置会话缓存的大小。返回之前有效的会话缓存大小。零代表无限制的会话缓存大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the sharing detection flag to b.
trans-unit.target: 将共享检测标志设置为b。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the internal bucket cache to size.
trans-unit.target: 将内部存储桶缓存的大小设置为size。

trans-unit.source: Sets the store's purpose to purpose. If specified, the verifications on the store will check every untrusted certificate's extensions are consistent with the purpose. The purpose is specified by constants:
trans-unit.target: 设置商店的目的为目的。如果指定，则商店中的验证将检查每个不受信任的证书的扩展名是否与目的一致。目的由常量指定：

trans-unit.source: Sets the system path (the Shell instance's PATH environment variable).
trans-unit.target: 设置系统路径（ Shell 实例的PATH环境变量）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the thread debug level. Available only if compiled with THREAD_DEBUG=-1.
trans-unit.target: 设置线程调试级别。只有在编译时THREAD_DEBUG=-1时才可用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the time to be used in verifications.
trans-unit.target: 设置核查中使用的时间。

trans-unit.source: Sets the time used in the verification. If not set, the current time is used.
trans-unit.target: 设置验证中使用的时间。如果没有设置,则使用当前时间。

trans-unit.source: Sets the type alias for alias_type as orig_type
trans-unit.target: 将 alias_type 的类型别名设置为 orig_type

trans-unit.source: Sets the upper bound of the supported SSL/TLS protocol version. See min_version= for the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 设置支持的SSL / TLS协议版本的上限。有关可能的值，请参见 min_version= 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of an attribute.
Sets the value to be returned by the next yield inside e.
trans-unit.target: 设置 e 内的下一个yield返回的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the verification flags to the context. See Store#flags=.
trans-unit.target: 将验证标志设置为上下文。请参阅 Store#flags= 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the verify callback for the server certification verification.
trans-unit.target: 设置服务器认证验证的验证回调。

trans-unit.source: Sets the version number for this Request. This should be 1 for compliant servers.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 Request 的版本号。对于兼容的服务器，该值应为 1 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the warning flags for category. See Warning.[] for the categories.
trans-unit.target: 设置 category 的警告标志。请参阅 Warning.[] 中的类别。

trans-unit.source: Sets this client's SSL private key
Sets to check the server certificate is valid for the hostname. See OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext#verify_hostname=
trans-unit.target: 设置以检查服务器证书对于主机名是否有效。参见 OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext#verify_hostname=

trans-unit.source: Sets userinfo, argument is string like 'name:pass'.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户信息,参数为'name:pass'等字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not to ignore case on completion.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在完成时忽略大小写。
扩展程序 val 的二传手。
